mapper.select: SELECT boardidx, boardname FROM BOARD WHERE universitycode='kosa' AND boardname NOT IN('공지사항', '건의사항', '자유게시판', '거래게시판')

SELECT p.idx, p.boardidx, p.universitycode, b.boardname, p.memberid, p.writedate, p.likenum, p.content, p.title FROM POST p JOIN BOARD b ON p.boardidx = b.boardidx WHERE b.boardname=#{allBoard} ORDER BY p.writedate DESC

SELECT p.boardidx, p.universitycode, b.boardname, p.memberid, p.writedate, p.likenum, p.content, p.title FROM POST p JOIN BOARD b ON p.boardidx = b.boardidx WHERE b.boardname=#{boardName} and p.universitycode='kosa' ORDER BY p.writedate DESC
